title: To Pay With Blood
description: What would you do to save a life? What if it were your brothers?  A nation ruled by Vampires. Humans forced to live within the massive walls of districts. A heartless leader bent on collecting an unpaid debt.  Avery Duval is your everyday, normal, typical human being trying to make ends meet as a nurse in District Three, but when she receives a frantic phone call from her brother, Jeff, she has no other option than to face him... and the ruthless leader of the Nation, Nikolas Deveraux.  Jeff owes a colossal debt. Nikolas wants his money. And he won't be satisfied until the debt is paid. And with no money to offer, Avery must choose whose life is more important; hers or Jeff's.  If you think for one second that the heroine falls in love with a monster, you couldn't be further from the truth. Follow Avery as she fights for her life... and even that may not be enough.
author: Kate   Mason
